mapper.select: select nseq, ninputdate, ngourpcd, nsubject, nfilename, npernm, nmemo, nflag from TB_MNOTICE
select nseq, ninputdate, ngourpcd, nsubject, nfilename, npernm, nmemo, nflag from TB_MNOTICE where nseq = #{nseq}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_MNOTICE (custcd, spjangcd, nseq, ninputdate, nsubject, nmemo) values (#{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, NEXT VALUE FOR NOTICE_SEQ, getdate(), #{nsubject}, #{nmemo})
mapper.update: update TB_MNOTICE set ngourpcd = #{ngourpcd}, nsubject = #{nsubject}, nfilename = #{nfilename}, npernm = #{npernm}, nmemo = #{nmemo}, nflag = #{nflag} where nseq = #{nseq}
